verification_guide.clarity: Verify goals and objectives are explicitly stated, instructions are not ambiguous, terminology is clearly defined, examples clarify concepts, no vague or confusing language
verification_guide.completeness: Verify all required sections are present, necessary information is included, edge cases are considered, exceptions are documented, prerequisites are stated, troubleshooting is included if needed
verification_guide.consistency: Verify terminology is consistent across documents, naming conventions are followed, format is consistent, structure follows established patterns, references to other documents are accurate
verification_guide.actionability: Verify instructions are specific and executable, examples are provided, step-by-step guides are clear, code examples are complete and runnable, actionable tasks are clearly defined
verification_guide.structure: Verify logical flow of information, clear section divisions, hierarchical organization, easy navigation, searchable structure, table of contents or index when appropriate
verification_guide.references: Verify references to other documents are accurate, links are valid and accessible, external resources are cited correctly, version numbers are included when relevant, broken links are avoided
verification_guide.language: Verify all response text is in Korean, check error messages and comments are in Korean
